TopicTitle: 1.0.1 bug? Kerbodyne fuel tanks not working properly.

Articles.Content:
Mods, please delete this thread, it's not a bug, I messed up the 1.0 upgrade, when deleting the mods from the Gamedata folder, I fixed everything now! Sorry for the rushed posting! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
